Package com.intellij.ui

Class SimpleColoredComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • com.intellij.ui.SimpleColoredComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTextFeedback, ColoredListCellRenderer, ColoredTreeCellRenderer, FQNameCellRenderer, NavBarItem, SimpleColoredRenderer

    public class SimpleColoredComponent
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements javax.accessibility.Accessible
    This is high performance Swing component which represents an icon with a colored text. The text consists of fragments. Each text fragment has its own color (foreground) and font style.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • myIconTextGap

      • append

        public final void append(java.lang.String fragment,
                         SimpleTextAttributes attributes)
        Appends string fragments to existing ones. Appended string will have specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        fragment - text fragment
        attributes - text attributes

      • append

        public final void append(java.lang.String fragment,
                         SimpleTextAttributes attributes,
                         int padding,
                         int align)
        Appends text fragment and sets it's end offset and alignment. See SimpleColoredComponent#appendTextPadding for details
        Parameters:
        fragment - text fragment
        attributes - text attributes
        padding - end offset of the text
        align - alignment between current offset and padding

      • append

        public void append(java.lang.String fragment,
                   SimpleTextAttributes attributes,
                   boolean isMainText)
        Appends string fragments to existing ones. Appended string will have specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        fragment - text fragment
        attributes - text attributes
        isMainText - main text of not

      • appendTextPadding

        public void appendTextPadding(int padding)

      • appendTextPadding

        public void appendTextPadding(int padding,
                              int align)
        Parameters:
        padding - end offset that will be set after drawing current text fragment
        align - alignment of the current text fragment, if it is SwingConstants.RIGHT or SwingConstants.TRAILING then the text fragment will be aligned to the right at the padding, otherwise it will be aligned to the left

      • setTextAlign

        public void setTextAlign(int align)

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear all special attributes of SimpleColoredComponent. They are icon, text fragments and their attributes, "paint focus border".

      • findFragmentAt

        public int findFragmentAt(int x)
        Returns the index of text fragment at the specified X offset.
        Parameters:
        x - the offset
        Returns:
        the index of the fragment, FRAGMENT_ICON if the icon is at the offset, or -1 if nothing is there.
